FunctionOracle.name: GET_USER_DEPTS
FunctionOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION OSD.GET_USER_DEPTS (user_id number) RETURN varchar2 IS
v_dept varchar2(32000) :=0;
cursor cur is select *
from main.all_user_sp_dept
where user_no = user_id;
begin
-------------------------------- get all user dept ---------------------
for i in cur loop
v_dept := v_dept||' , '||i.dept_no;
end loop;

return v_dept;

exception
when no_data_found then
raise;
END;
